Package server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Server
  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for running the server, including initialization of database connection, loading event data from database, setting up queue structure and launching client connection listener. Individual client connections are handled by Client subclasses, notably Guide.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Server.Task
      Structure representing task given to main server thread, containing all the data necessary to handle the task and respond to requester.

    • Method Detail

      • isCommandRecognizedByServer

        public static boolean isCommandRecognizedByServer​(java.lang.String command)
        Checks if command is recognized by server. Recognized commands should be served in Server.MainServerTask.handleTask(Task) and thus should never be responded with invalid command error.
        Parameters:
        command - Command to check for server recognition
        Returns:
        True if server recognizes this command, false otherwise

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Server socket thread, launching system thread (main thread) and connecting with clients.
        Parameters:
        args - Ignored
